text:
Hi Everyone, we are sending transactional emails to a group email in google workspace.   We are getting the following message . Can someone help if they experience this problem?
```Soft bounced

Temporary technical issue with the recipient's email

MAILBOX_MISCONFIGURATION smtp; A delivery loop was detected which causes this email to be undeliverable.
The recipient's mailbox is under reconstruction or down for some other reason. It's not accepting mail at this time, please retry again later.```

Hello, I want to know if its possible to have a dynamic email template that switches out content without the hassle of cloning the email multiple times? Additionally, is it possible to use the dynamic email template for automation via a workflow?

i'm using programmable email and it works.  There are some challenges to previewing. if using if statements or loops with a dependency on a contact properties, you see the hubl tags in the preview as it doesn't render the tags. So while it works, it's not always a great editor experience for marketer building the email.
Have you looked at Smart Content? <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/website-pages/create-and-manage-smart-content-rules|https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/website-pages/create-and-manage-smart-content-rules>

I'm using programable email beta and want the headers and links in the custom module to inherit the same styles from the design settings in the DND Email template. Does anyone know if there are HUBL tokens for the styles?
